About Me

I am a senior industrial engineer and a student at UC Berkeley. I would like to become a full stack developer. Currently I know how to design mobile responsive websites using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I can dynamically change the content of a webpage using third-party APIs and save information using localStorage.

Work

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

The main purpose of this project is to create a "weather dashboard" using "OpenWeather API". In this dashboard, users are able to search for a city name and view the "current weather condition" along with the "5-days forecast".

View Project on GitHub

Word Search

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

The main purpose of this project is to provide an easy-to-navigate platform that enables users to search for different words and find their definition, references and examples. This project also features “word of the day”, “word quiz”, “webpage translation” and saving favorite words.

View Project on GitHub

Work Day Scheduler

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

The main purpose of this project is to create a "daily planner tool" that enable users to save events for each hour of the day.

View Project on GitHub
